metadata.title: CVE-2019-14884 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Moodle 3.7 before 3.73, 3.6 before 3.6.7 and3.5 before 3.5.9, where a reflected XSS possible from some fatal errormessages.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
